Package dev.shirokuro.commandutility

Interface ErrorHandler

All Known Implementing Classes:
ErrorHandler.DefaultErrorHandler
public interface ErrorHandler
ErrorHandler handles errors dispatched by CommandGroup.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes 
    Modifier and Type Interface Description
    static class  ErrorHandler.Builder  
    static class  ErrorHandler.DefaultErrorHandler  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static ErrorHandler.Builder builder()  
    static ErrorHandler defaultHandler()  
    void onExecutionFailed​(CommandGroup caller, org.bukkit.command.CommandSender dispatcher, CommandExecutionException exception)
    Called when CommandHandler.execute threw CommandExecutionException.
    void onInvalidArgs​(CommandGroup caller, org.bukkit.command.CommandSender dispatcher, Command command)
    Called when args input by CommandSender is invalid.
    void onPreferredCommandNotFound​(CommandGroup caller, org.bukkit.command.CommandSender dispatcher, BranchNode branch)

  • Method Details

    • defaultHandler

      static ErrorHandler defaultHandler()

    • builder

      static ErrorHandler.Builder builder()

    • onExecutionFailed

      void onExecutionFailed​(CommandGroup caller, org.bukkit.command.CommandSender dispatcher, CommandExecutionException exception)
      Called when CommandHandler.execute threw CommandExecutionException.

      It is recommended to send exception message to dispatcher like below.

       dispatcher.sendMessage("Error: " + exception.getMessage());
      Parameters:
      caller - caller. Not null
      dispatcher - dispatcher of the command. Not null
      exception - exception thrown by CommandHandler.execute. Not null

    • onPreferredCommandNotFound

      void onPreferredCommandNotFound​(CommandGroup caller, org.bukkit.command.CommandSender dispatcher, BranchNode branch)
      Called when CommandGroup couldn't find preferred command for CommandSender's input.

      It is recommended to send usage message to dispatcher like below.

       String requiredStr = command.getArgs().stream()
         .map(info -> info.toString(false))
         .collect(Collectors.joining(" "));
 StringJoiner joiner = new StringJoiner(" ");
 command.getSections().forEach(joiner::add);
 joiner.add(requiredStr);
 dispatcher.sendMessage("Usage: /" + joiner.toString());
      Parameters:
      caller - caller. Not null
      dispatcher - dispatcher of the command. Not null
      branch - branch. Not null

    • onInvalidArgs

      void onInvalidArgs​(CommandGroup caller, org.bukkit.command.CommandSender dispatcher, Command command)
      Called when args input by CommandSender is invalid.

      It is recommended to send candidates to dispatcher like below.

       String requiredStr = command.getArgs().stream()
         .map(info -> info.toString(false))
         .collect(Collectors.joining(" "));
 StringJoiner joiner = new StringJoiner(" ");
 command.getSections().forEach(joiner::add);
 joiner.add(requiredStr);
 dispatcher.sendMessage("Usage: /" + joiner.toString());
      Parameters:
      caller - caller. Not null
      dispatcher - dispatcher of the command. Not null
      command - command. Not null
